Prismatic Grace.description: Prismatic Grace is a piece of craftable Exotic armour in Dauntless. It is crafted from Rezakiri reagents.
Prismatic Grace.name: Prismatic Grace

unique_effects.description: After reviving another player, grant them a Radiant Prism that blocks incoming damage for {{prismTime}} seconds.
unique_effects.name: PrismaticGraceRevivePrism

unique_effects.description: The first time you take lethal damage, gain a Radiant Prism that blocks incoming damage for {{prismTime}} seconds.
unique_effects.name: PrismaticGraceLethalDamagePrism

unique_effects.description: While active, reviving another player fully restores both players but removes the Prism even at full danger.
unique_effects.name: PrismaticGraceActivePrismRevive

The Skullforge.description: The Skullforge is a piece of craftable Exotic armour in Dauntless. It is crafted from Firebrand Charrogg reagents.
The Skullforge.name: The Skullforge

unique_effects.description: {{damage}}% of all damage dealt becomes a stamina shield (max {{staminaShieldMax}}) that depletes first when spending stamina. Depletes slowly after {{staminaShieldTime}} seconds not dealing damage.
unique_effects.name: DamageStaminaShield

Timeweave Gauntlets.description: {{typeAlt}} protection, part of the Timeweave set.
Timeweave Gauntlets.name: Timeweave Gauntlets

Timeweave Helm.name: Timeweave Helm

Timeweave Robes.description: {{typeAlt}} protection, part of the Timeweave set.
Timeweave Robes.name: Timeweave Robes

Tragic Echo.description: Tragic Echo is a piece of craftable Exotic armour in Dauntless. It is crafted from Shrowd reagents.
Tragic Echo.name: Tragic Echo

unique_effects.description: Upon your first death, become a shadow clone that deals {{damage}}% increased damage for {{damageTime}} seconds.
unique_effects.name: TragicEchoDamageIncrease
